title: One
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: In One, students use illustrations to identify different objects found in a bedroom. The simple repetitive phrases provides information about the number one with supportive pictures and the use of the high-frequency word one.
highFrequencyWords: Guided Reading Lesson PDF
comprehension: Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
awareness: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
phonics: Initial and Final Sounds                : Discriminate initial consonant /b/ sound
